channel.title: Hyndburn on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Hyndburn on News Lancashire

item.title: Seven men charged in Blackburn and Accrington cocaine supply investigation
item.description: Seven men have been charged as part of a police investigation into the supply of cocaine across East Lancashire. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Raft of events including food festival, carnival, Proms in the Park and soapbox challenge announced by council
item.description: Hyndburn Council will support 23 events in 2026 promising activities for all the family spread across high streets and green spaces around the borough. Source: LEP Preston
